title: How to focus to read books - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to give yourself self some offers or have to set a goal. I read this on a website called A-book/week It gives you a seven day challenge during seven days you have to read a book of your choice and after seven days you have to send some review about the book.They also gives prizes to the best reviewer of the month. You can try it.I thik it will helps you to grow your reading habit. And you can also do some yoga like breathing to gain focus. if you really wish to focus,then only you can focus. Thanks. Peace.✌

Identify a topic that interests you and go to the library in search of a volume. Not all books addressing such topic will be of interest, but hopefully you’ll find something. You can always ask a librarian for recommendations, so have a list of issues you are interested in at hand. Good luck!
